content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "read_file" command to retrieve the list of hiking trails from the file "potential_hiking_trails.txt" and received a successful response with the list. I then used the "google" command to search for information about the hiking trails and received a response with several website links. I received a message from the AI to browse the AllTrails website, which provides information on various hiking trails around the world, including several in the Czech Republic such as the Brno Reservoir Trail, Moravian Karst, Pálava Hills, Jeseníky Mountains, Krkonoše National Park, and Šumava National Park. The app offers features such as verified trails, offline maps, and wrong-turn alerts, and also promotes environmental initiatives such as Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "pip install alltrails"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement alltrails (from versions: none)\\nERROR: No matching distribution found for alltrails\\n\\n[notice] A new release of pip is available: 23.0.1 -> 23.1.2\\n[notice] To update, run: pip install --upgrade pip\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
